text: Ara taderake nuh-era brttanta sonana [1]. Tini tara sampradayake balechilena, ‘he amara sampradaya! Amara abasthiti o allah‌ra ayatasamuha dbara amara upadesa pradana tomadera kache yadi duhsaha haya tabe ami to allah‌ra upara nirbhara kari. Sutaram tomara tomadera kartabya sthira kare na'o ebam tomara yaderake sarika karecha taderake'o daka, pare yena kartabya bisaye tomadera kono aspastata na thake. Tarapara amara sambandhe tomadera kaja sesa kare phela ebam amake abakasa di'o na
